Folder.label: VERILOG Component Instantiation
Folder.Template:
// The following must be inserted into your Verilog file for this // core to be instantiated. Change the instance name and port connections // (in parentheses) to your own signal names.
sram YourInstanceName ( .addra(addra), // Bus [3 : 0] .addrb(addrb), // Bus [3 : 0] .clka(clka), .clkb(clkb), .dina(dina), // Bus [15 : 0] .dinb(dinb), // Bus [15 : 0] .doutb(doutb), // Bus [15 : 0] .ena(ena), .enb(enb), .ndb(ndb), .rfdb(rfdb), .rdyb(rdyb), .wea(wea), .web(web));

// The following must be inserted into your Verilog file for this // core to be instantiated. Change the instance name and port connections // (in parentheses) to your own signal names.
sram_bank YourInstanceName ( .addra(addra), // Bus [12 : 0] .addrb(addrb), // Bus [12 : 0] .clka(clka), .clkb(clkb), .dina(dina), // Bus [15 : 0] .doutb(doutb), // Bus [15 : 0] .ena(ena), .enb(enb), .ndb(ndb), .rfdb(rfdb), .rdyb(rdyb), .wea(wea));

Folder.label: VHDL Component Instantiation
